job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Skills Requiredltbrgt	Medical device or any regulatory industry company experience required ltbrgt	Degree in computer science or software engineering or electrical engineering ltbrgt	510 years experience in software development within Linux OS with the help of CCltbrgt	Scripting in python is good to haveltbrgt	Translating software requirements into software design experienceltbrgt	Someone who understands threading and processes in Linux real time operating systems UML software architecture ITC interface protocol write API ltbrgt	Cyber security private or public keys or encryption is a plusltbrgt	IEC 62304 or ISO 14971 risk regulations is a plusltbrgt	Soft skills work well in a team environment under agile methodologyltbrgt
